query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS template_translations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  template_id INT NOT NULL,
  language ENUM('ar', 'en') NOT NULL,
  template_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  suitable_for TEXT,
  bot_personality TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES business_templates(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX template_translations_template_id_idx (template_id),
  INDEX template_translations_language_idx (language)
);
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  template_id INT NOT NULL,
  language ENUM('ar', 'en') NOT NULL,
  template_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  suitable_for TEXT,
  bot_personality TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES business_templates(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX template_translations_template_id_idx (template_id),
  INDEX template_translations_language_idx (language)
);
